channel.title: Clienthandler error
channel.description: Sometimes, when I run my server, I get this error when trying to connect: [code]Starting United PK on 0.0.0.0:43594 ClientHandler: Accepted Connection Fully ClientHandler: Accepted from c-67-173-65-96.hsd1.il.comcast.net:52473 Owner is signing onto server. Did not save for Owner ClientHandler: Client Owner disconnected. ClientHandler: Rejected *BLOCKED IP FOR SAFETY* ClientHandler: Accepted *BLOCKED IP FOR SAFETY* ClientHandler: Rejected *BLOCKED IP FOR SAFETY* ClientHandler: Accepted from *BLOCKED IP FOR SAFETY* ClientHandler: Rejected *BLOCKED IP FOR SAFETY* ClientHandler: Accepted from *BLOCKED IP FOR SAFETY* [/code] What the heck, why do I get rejected? I'm not IP banned or banned, what's wrong?

item.title: Clienthandler error
item.dc:creator: @Kitno Kitno
item.description:
@Kitno wrote:

Maybe it’s your ISP? Are you using a proxy? I’ve never seen that before tbh.

Read full topic

item.title: Clienthandler error
item.dc:creator: @MMcGrady2 MMcGrady2
item.description:
@MMcGrady2 wrote:

Sometimes, when I run my server, I get this error when trying to connect:

Starting United PK on 0.0.0.0:43594 ClientHandler: Accepted Connection Fully ClientHandler: Accepted from c-67-173-65-96.hsd1.il.comcast.net:52473 Owner is signing onto server. Did not save for Owner ClientHandler: Client Owner disconnected. ClientHandler: Rejected *BLOCKED IP FOR SAFETY* ClientHandler: Accepted *BLOCKED IP FOR SAFETY* ClientHandler: Rejected *BLOCKED IP FOR SAFETY* ClientHandler: Accepted from *BLOCKED IP FOR SAFETY* ClientHandler: Rejected *BLOCKED IP FOR SAFETY* ClientHandler: Accepted from *BLOCKED IP FOR SAFETY* What the heck, why do I get rejected? I’m not IP banned or banned, what’s wrong?

Read full topic
